text: Plaque for the Chicago sculpture Olmec Head, Number 8 is a colossal head sculpture. The original sculpture is located at the Museum of Anthropology in Xalapa, Veracruz. ==Reproductions== There are several replicas. The reproduced stone sculpture in Chicago, on the east side of the Field Museum of Natural History, was created by Ignacio Perez Solano and installed in 2000. ==See also== * List of public art in Chicago * Olmec colossal heads ==References== Category:2000 establishments in Illinois Category:Outdoor sculptures in Chicago Category:Stone sculptures in the United States
title: Olmec Head, Number 8
